title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. V, pt. 2371 - Access To And Correction Or Amendment Of Records Of The Department Of Taxation And Finance And The State Tax Commission Subject To The Personal Privacy Protection Law
content:

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. V, pt. 2371

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, §94; Tax Law, §171

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
